Integral Marketing is a Digital Advertising network solution

We use cutting edge platform technology in the display advertising market. Offering efficient cost optimization for various brands online. Our world wide consumers and networks lets us integrate our knowledge and experience to provide successful media buy results.

Solution For Advertisers

Reach

IM Global Reach deliver across seven continents with 24 different languages. Our technology can ensure your ads are displayed in the particular markets you are aiming for, With years of experience working in the digital marketing industry, we can ensure you of the global scale you need to succeed.

Cost Effective Media Buy Team

Our Expert Media Buying Team can define the right websites to ensure we cater to our advertisers’ campaign goals. Whether your advertising goal is driven by branding or ROI metrics, , identify, and target the audience most likely to respond to the value of what is being offered. you can rest assure that IM has the ability to help you segment and target the most relevant audience for the success of your ad campaigns.

Audience Targeting

IM Global Reach deliver across seven continents with 24 different languages. Our technology can ensure your ads are displayed in the particular markets you are aiming for, With years of experience working in the digital marketing industry, we can ensure you of the global scale you need to succeed.

In House Design Team

IM design team can manage all aspects of branding design from small concept, to large design right through to a complete suite of products. We are also expert in product light-weighting. In addition, our in-house creative studio teams will be glad to assist you in developing high-impact creatives that get the most out of every campaign.

Solution For Publishers

Various Ad Formats

IM provide a diverse array of ad formats, which add value and excitement to your sites, and generate higher CPMs. ad spaces - pops,overlays,banners,sliders, interstitials, ads on photos, video sliders, and ads on videos. These creatives generate high click-through rates and visceral responses from your users Our diverse solutions can be easily customized to meet your needs - bringing you new sources of revenue, without altering your sites.

Yield Management

Working direct with IM enables your smooth and rapid entry into new markets, generating sustainable long-term revenue. Utilizing our extensive yield management expertise, based on years of experience in global monetization, we create solutions tailored to your specific inventory, advantages, and constraints. increasing income, and ensuring 100% fill rate and the highest CPMs.

Real Time Reporting

IM reporting interface is simple and easy to use and a nature extension of our traditional delivery management tool. Our analytics allow publishers to drill down from high-level information across all ad unites Ultimately, our real time reporting and analytics tools don't just report on ad unites information and data, but help answer the question "why?" when a particular placement performs better than another.

Dedicated Account Management

At IM, we understand the importance of how account management, campaign customization, and optimization impacts the result of every impression served. For this reason, IM dedicates highly experienced account managers to personally handle Your Inventoy and your personal needs , to sure the Highest Ecpm returns on your traffic.
